answers.answer: I was given one too but I didn't hate it as everyone else does.  It kinda just tasted like flat orange soda. I'm overweight so that's why she gave me the test but everything came back normal. I was about 13 weeks or so.
I was sent at 13 weeks for the one hour and had to do the 3 hour one this week (im 15 weeks now).
I am 16 weeks now and this is my first pregnancy but did not held any test like this. So should ask my doctor for this test or wait ?
The test isn't done till later in the pregnancy unless your dr is worried.
I was told I may be sent early if the Dr is concerned. I have pcos which means i have a higher chance of GD. If your wondering why he sent you early just ask.

I'm going to ask when I see her in a week or so. I'm overweight but I've never had issues. I'm sure she must have some reasoning. If it wasn't for this app, I would have assumed it was normal for this time period Lol.
I was sent early because I have a history of miscarriages and stillbirths.

question: Anyone else being sent early to see about gestational diabetes? This is my first pregnancy, I'm 26, everything looks normal, I'm 14w3d and I'm already taking the nasty one hour glucose test. My doctor gave me the script two weeks ago even, so I was only about 12 weeks then. Thought the tests weren't until about 25 weeks.Any other July mommies doing this already??
title: glucose test
